description: This file declares the interface for the Transport Layer Security (TLS) Application Connector (App Connector) component, including function prototypes for creating, removing, enrolling, and initializing the TCP SSL app connector object within the system.

methods.name: TlsCreateAppConnector
methods.description: Creates and returns a new application connector handle, taking container, owner, and reserved contexts as parameters.

methods.name: TlsAcoCreate
methods.description: Creates and initializes a new TLS ACO object, returning its handle.

methods.name: TlsAcoRemove
methods.description: Removes and deallocates the specified TLS ACO object.

methods.name: TlsAcoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrols or registers sub-objects or dependencies related to the TLS ACO object.
